person.persName: Lewis C. Lay (Union County, Tennessee, farm hand and Private (U.S.A.).)

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmhand and soldier. Campbell County, Tennessee, native. Son of William Lay and Sarah Lay. Married to Hester A. Lay. Father of Tilghman L. Lay. Student in Grainger County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmhand in Union County in 1860. Served in the 1st Tennessee Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from April 2, 1863.
